recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta with garlic until crispy.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Combine cooked spaghetti with pancetta and garlic.
Remove from heat and stir in egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
Cook chicken breasts in a skillet until fully cooked, then slice thinly.
In a separate pan, melt butter and add garlic.
Stir in heavy cream and Parmesan cheese until smooth.
Combine fettuccine, chicken, and Alfredo sauce.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef with onion and garlic in a skillet.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning.
Fill taco shells with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop Romaine lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons, Parmesan cheese, and garlic.
Toss with Caesar dressing and serve.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and add garlic.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Spread tomato sauce over pizza dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until crust is golden.
Garnish with fresh basil and a drizzle of olive oil.

recipes.name: Blueberry Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, whisk buttermilk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients, then fold in blueberries.
Cook pancakes on a hot griddle until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Combine cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, bell pepper, and olives in a bowl.
Add feta cheese.
Toss with olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper.

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and add garlic.
Add shrimp and cook until pink and opaque.
Stir in lemon juice and season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F).
Grease and flour two 9-inch round baking pans.
In a large bowl, combine dry ingredients.
Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla; beat on medium speed for 2 minutes.
Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin).
Pour batter into prepared pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool completely.

recipes.name: Lasagna
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Brown ground beef with onion in a skillet.
Mix ricotta cheese with egg and basil.
Layer noodles, meat sauce, and cheese mixture in a baking dish.
Top with mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 45 minutes.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat butter and olive oil in a pan.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Stir in lemon juice, parsley, and red pepper flakes.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Apple Pie
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Mix flour and butter to form a crumbly dough.
Press dough into pie dish and fill with apple mixture.
Cover with additional dough and crimp edges.
Brush with beaten egg.
Bake for 45-50 minutes.

recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
Whisk in milk, egg, and melted butter.
Pour batter onto a heated griddle and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.

recipes.name: Quiche Lorraine
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).
Place pie crust in a pie dish.
Spread bacon and cheese over crust.
Whisk together eggs, cream, and milk.
Pour over bacon and cheese.
Bake for 35-40 minutes.

recipes.name: BBQ Ribs
instructions: Preheat oven to 150°C (300°F).
Mix paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, pepper, and salt.
Rub spice mixture onto ribs.
Wrap ribs in foil and bake for 2.5 hours.
Unwrap, brush with BBQ sauce, and bake for an additional 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 2 cups semisweet and/or milk chocolate chips
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Whisk together flour and baking soda.
Mix butter, sugars, and salt until smooth.
Add vanilla and eggs, one at a time.
Add flour mixture and chocolate chips.
Drop dough onto baking sheets and bake for 10-12 minutes.

recipes.name: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados in a bowl.
Mix in lime juice and salt.
Stir in onion, cilantro, tomatoes, and garlic.
Add cayenne pepper and mix well.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Mix lettuce, Parmesan, and croutons in a bowl.
Whisk dressing, lemon juice, and garlic.
Toss salad with dressing.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Baked Ziti
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cook ziti according to package instructions.
Mix ricotta cheese, egg, garlic, and oregano.
Combine ziti with marinara sauce and cheese mixture.
Pour into a baking dish and top with mozzarella and Parmesan.
Bake for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix flour and butter and press into a baking pan.
Bake crust for 20 minutes.
Mix sugar, flour, lemon juice, and eggs.
Pour over crust and bake for an additional 25 minutes.
Dust with powdered sugar once cooled.

recipes.name: Butternut Squash Soup
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot and cook onion and garlic until soft.
Add butternut squash and vegetable broth.
Simmer until squash is tender.
Blend soup until smooth and stir in cream.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and cook onion and garlic.
Add mushrooms and cook until soft.
Stir in Arborio rice and cook for 2 minutes.
Add white wine and cook until absorbed.
Gradually add broth, stirring constantly, until rice is cooked.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Crispy Chicken Wings
instructions: Preheat oil in a deep fryer or large pot.
Mix flour, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
Coat chicken wings in flour mixture.
Fry wings until golden and crispy.
Drain on paper towels.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Pie
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Mix pumpkin, brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves.
Beat in eggs and cream.
Pour filling into pie crust.
Bake for 15 minutes, then reduce temperature to 180°C (350°F) and bake for an additional 45 minutes.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Cook ground beef and onion until browned.
Mix with cooked rice, tomato sauce, and oregano.
Stuff peppers with mixture and top with cheese.
Bake for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Coconut Rice
instructions: Combine rice, coconut milk, water, and salt in a pot.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low.
Cover and simmer for 18-20 minutes.
Let sit for 5 minutes before fluffing with a fork.

recipes.name: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil potatoes until tender.
Drain and return to pot.
Add garlic, butter, and milk.
Mash until smooth and creamy.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Mango Salsa
instructions: Combine mangoes, bell pepper, onion, and jalapeño in a bowl.
Stir in lime juice and cilantro.
Season with salt and mix well.

recipes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Dredge eggplant slices in flour, then dip in egg, and coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry eggplant slices in olive oil until golden.
Layer eggplant in a baking dish with marinara sauce and cheeses.
Bake for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Clam Chowder
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook bacon in a pot until crispy.
Remove bacon and cook onion and garlic in the same pot.
Add clams, potatoes, and clam juice.
Simmer until potatoes are tender.
Stir in heavy cream and flour.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Chili Con Carne
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook ground beef with onion and garlic until browned.
Add tomatoes, beans, chili powder, and cumin.
Simmer for 30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Balsamic Glazed Salmon
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix balsamic vinegar, honey, and garlic.
Season salmon with salt and pepper.
Place salmon on a baking sheet and brush with glaze.
Bake for 15-20 minutes.

recipes.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix spinach, artichokes, mayonnaise, sour cream, Parmesan, mozzarella, and garlic.
Transfer to a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan and cook chicken until browned.
Add bell pepper and onion and cook until tender.
Stir in fajita seasoning.
Serve with tortillas, sour cream, and salsa.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, broccoli)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan.
Add garlic and ginger, cook until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender.
Add soy sauce and cook for a few more minutes.
Thicken with cornstarch if desired.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Combine all vegetables and olives in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Toss to combine and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil and butter in a pan.
Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley.

recipes.name: Carrot Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Add oil, eggs, carrots, and walnuts. Mix until well combined.
Pour batter into a greased pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook chicken until browned.
Add garlic and cook for another minute.
Stir in heavy cream and butter.
Add Parmesan cheese and cook until sauce thickens.
Toss with pasta and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve.

recipes.name: Crispy Tofu
ingredients: 1 block firm tofu, drained and cubed
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Toss tofu cubes with cornstarch.
Heat oil in a pan and fry tofu until crispy.
Season with soy sauce, salt, and pepper.

recipes.name: Roasted Vegetables
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (e.g., carrots, bell peppers, zucchini)
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Toss vegetables with olive oil, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes.

recipes.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Remove stems from mushrooms and chop finely.
Mix cream cheese, Parmesan, garlic, and chopped mushroom stems.
Fill mushroom caps with mixture and sprinkle with breadcrumbs.
Bake for 20 minutes.
